name: WALL·E
0:
”Alexa, ask wally the robot to give me a recycling tip”
”Alexa, open wally the robot”
”Alexa, ask wally the robot for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wally the robot
des: WALL·E inspired by the famous robot from the Pixar animation film gives you a fact about recycling, it doesn't end there, it gives you a tip regarding the same fact and sometimes pictures to help you find right alternatives to plastic and other non-ecofriendly materials.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
